Question: Reiner directed this person for a third time in the classic romantic comedy When Harry Met Sally..
Hints: In 1996, this person was the guest star of the third episode of Muppets Tonight.
This person hosted three Grammy Awards Telecasts: the 29th Grammys; the 30th Grammys; and the 31st Grammys.
This person later went on to provide the voice of Mike Wazowski in the Pixar film Monsters, Inc.
